column5: Can anyone out there tell me what time the Beer Store opens in Fort Frances during the week? Thank you.Jig'N'John
hey tracker - are you sure about those sunday hours? my outfitter said there's nothing open for beer on sunday.thanks
who's right - tracker or the outfitter?
Why don't you go to the source?http://www.thebeerstore.ca/storesand...9A0DAB&id=3492
thanks guys - i tried the beer store web site but couldn't get to the hours page. no more dry mouth worries now!
